snippet: Ann E. Selvitelli, the director of college counseling at Suffield Academy in Suffield, Conn., advises rising seniors to talk to their parents about college at least one day per week and to get ahead of their applications.
abstract: Ann E. Selvitelli, the director of college counseling at Suffield Academy in Suffield, Conn., advises rising seniors to talk to their parents about college at least one day per week and to get ahead of their applications.

headline.main: Counselor's Calendar | July Checklist for Seniors
